content:
I think I'll keep it simple with just the customized coffee mug for now. I want to focus on getting the perfect quote and design for my best friend. But I'll definitely keep the care package idea in mind for future gifts! Thanks for the suggestion.

By the way, I also picked up a few things for my mom while I was at the mall last week, including a coffee mug and a scented candle from Bath & Body Works, totaling $25.
